#summary Download and Installation Instructions

= Obtaining Magnum =

svn checkout http://magnum-py.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ magnum


= Running Magnum =

   # Modify config.py to suit your needs
   # If you need objects in shared memory, modify shared.py to suit your needs
   # Put magnum's parent directory in you PYTHONPATH environment variable
   # ./magum/serve.py start
